tool.name: Circos

param.name: archive
param.label: Input archive of Circos data and conf

tool.help:
Circos Wrapper ==============
1. Produce "nice" archives. (i.e. put /etc/ and /data/ in a folder inside the archive). Rude archives do not do this and write all over data in your CWD and drive people insane. 2. Put circos confs in /folder/etc/circos.conf 3. Put data in /folder/data/file 4. Tar/Tar.gz/Zip that folder up and execute it with this tool.
